name: heroku-release
description: Release node.js apps to heroku without using Git (so that .gitignored assets are included)

scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:cli
scripts.test:cli: npm run test:cli:release && npm run test:cli:promote
scripts.test:cli:release: babel-node src/cli.js -a heroku-release-demo-staging --dir test/fixture && babel-node test/test-environment staging
scripts.test:cli:promote: babel-node src/cli.js promote --pipeline heroku-release-demo -s heroku-release-demo-staging -t heroku-release-demo-prod && babel-node test/test-environment prod
